Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_position

The function AIL_3D_position retrieves the current 3D position of a 3D sample, the listener, or a 3D object.

void AIL_3D_position(
  H3DPOBJECT obj,
  F32 *X,
  F32 *Y,
  F32 *Z
);

In Parameters

obj
indicates the 3D sample, the listener, or the 3D object to query.

Out Parameters

X
returns the X coordinate.
Y
returns the Y coordinate.
Z
returns the Z coordinate.

Discussion

You can pass NULL for any value that you're not interested in.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_3D_position
Related Basic Types: F32, H3DPOBJECT, void
